Summary: i saw something odd over miami beach at dusk 2001
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Miami Beach
There were no other sightings in Miami Beach on or around July 10th 2001
divs: Sighting DetailsAt above dates and timesi was midnight property,manager for alarge condo, in miami beach,i usually wentto the roof of the building to check around, when i looked at the sky, and saw aunsually, bright star, as i stared, it seemed it sensed, this and it sucked itself in, never to reapear,I was naturally very curiuos, and i still wonder tothis day.
